name: Alvida
effect:
If this Character would be K.O.’d, you may trash 1 Character with 6000 power or less from your hand instead.

[Activate: Main] [Once per Turn] You may give 1 of your opponent’s rested DON!! cards to 1 of your opponent’s Characters: give up to 1 rested DON!! card from their owner’s cost area and give it to their Leader or 1 of their Characters.
